column4: I have 80GB of unallocated space. Whenever I try to create a new partition with gparted, it says the kernel was unable to re-read the partition table on /dev/sda (device or resource busy)..
uh yeah, that's what I said I'm using.
I would try to use fdisk /dev/sda and create the new partition and use w to write it.   I have seen where it will say it is mounted but on the next reboot the new table will be picked up.
